'''Mualani''' is a playable {{Hydro}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Being a guide, a surfer, and a watersports shop owner for the [[Meztli|People of the Springs]] who bears the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name|UMJ|'''Umoja'''|bearer=1}}, Mualani is an active and sweet person, and she is always able to satisfy her clients.
